programme.desc: Carly sets out hoping to uncover the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon, but after digging up some damaging dirt on the Arcadia Movement, she soon finds herself squaring off in a psychic duel with Sayer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Sayer signs up for a Shadow Duel against a Dark Signer who's out for revenge while Akiza agrees to battle a dark and sinister supermodel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the Dark Signer double duel draws to a climactic close, Carly and Misty unfold a catastrophic card combo that could send Akiza and Sayer to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After Akiza falls into a state of unconsciousness, her father turns to Yusei in a last ditch effort to wake his beloved daughter from her catatonic condition.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Signers presses on, Yusei turns to his trusty Stardust Dragon in an effort to keep the power of Akiza's Black Rose Dragon at bay.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Yusei, Jack, Akiza and Luna all gathered together, Director Goodwin seizes the moment and decides to shed some light on the dark and formidable foes the four Signers will soon be battling.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In an effort to rid the Satellite Sector of the Dark Signers, Crow ventures out and challenges a sinister looking sneak to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Crow challenges the newest member of the Dark Signers to a Turbo Duel, but before Crow's Blackwings can even take flight, his opponent unleashes an aerial assault of his own.
programme.sub-title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the sky-high battle between Crow and Greiger heats up, Crow looks to elevate his game in order to ground Greiger's aerial attacks before they send him to the Netherworld forever.
programme.sub-title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Crow turns to his feathered friends in a last ditch effort to take out Greiger's Earthbound Immortal. Can Crow and his Blackwing's rise to the occasion?
programme.sub-title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Haunted by the memories of his last battle with Kalin, Yusei looks to bury the past by agreeing to duel his former friend in a rematch. Can Yusei defeat Kalin and seal the tower that this Dark Signer is guarding?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the rematch between Kalin and Yusei continues, Yusei must find a way to out-think and out-maneuver the dark power of Kalin's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Roman challenges Yusei to a Shadow Duel at the site of the original Ener-D Reactor. Meanwhile, Director Goodwin decides to make an unexpected visit to the Satellite Sector to settle some unfinished business he has with his Dark Signer brother.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Roman rages on, Roman takes a time out to reveal the truth behind the original Ener-D Reactor's meltdown and the role Yusei's father played.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack agrees to Turbo Duel Carly in an effort to defeat the darkness that has taken control of her. Can Jack rid the evil that has come to possess this one-time roving reporter?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack kicks his duel into overdrive and summons his Red Dragon Archfiend in a desperate attempt to free Carly from the Dark Signers' control.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to finally find out the whereabouts of her long-lost brother, Misty challenges Akiza to a Shadow Duel in a maze of mirrors.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After unlocking Akiza's psychic powers, Sayer sets his sights on using them to get even with the Dark Signers for destroying the Arcadia Movement.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei, Jack and Crow face off against Goodwin in the ultimate Shadow Duel showdown.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the safety of the world hanging in the balance, Yusei, Jack and Crow look to tip the scales in their favor by setting their sights on Goodwin's Earthbound Immortal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points running on empty, Yusei looks to rev it up one last time in order to defeat Goodwin and save the world from the destructive powers of the King of the Netherworld!

programme.title: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!

programme.title: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! All hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!

programme.title: The battle for Block D comes to a shocking end and the winner that emerges from the cloud of dust stuns the audience even more! Meanwhile, Luffy, Zoro, Kin'emon, and Wicka of the Tontatta Tribe are about to reach the lift to the palace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Match?! A Surprising Result of Block D!

programme.title: Viola, aka Violet, once a great princess of the Dressrosa family, shows Luffy & the others a secret entrance into the palace which avoids the use of the heavily-guarded lift. In the palace's Suit Chamber, Navy Admiral Fujitora reveals his plans.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Admiral's Decision! Fujitora vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: The final round at the Corrida Colosseum finally begins, as Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the Flare-Flare Fruit! As the stakes escalate, can one champion beat the others & snatch the fruit from the Colosseum's newest hazard?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Final Round Starts! Diamante the Hero Shows Up!

programme.title: Luffy and his group continue their ascent towards Doflamingo's inner sanctum, but standing in their way is an executive of the family whose power is so strong moving past him seems impossible! Meanwhile, Cavendish learns the dark secrets of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises Up!

programme.title: As Operation SOP finally gets underway but as Leo makes the dash to hide the Tatabasco grape in Sugar's fruit basket, Robin calls for an emergency stop to the plan! Meanwhile, Luffy, Violet, and Zoro are stalled by Pica whose sheer size overwhelms them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dragon Claw Strikes! Lucy's Intimidating Attack!

programme.title: Operation SOP is underway and nearing its final stage! But Trebol proves a far stronger guard for Sugar than was expected, so Robin hatches a plan to lure him away. But is there enough time to execute the plan before the ruse is discovered?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat Sugar! The Army of the Little People Charges!

programme.title: The Tontattas are devastated by Trebol's furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander Toy Soldier's stunning true identity! The Toy Soldier finally shakes off Lao G and gets moving again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last Light of Hope! The Secret of Our Commander!

programme.title: Zoro continues his deadly duel with the nearly indestructible Pica! While the Toy Soldier narrowly escapes Lao G only to come face to face with Gladius! Luffy continues his mad dash to the top of the palace to face Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rupture Human! Gladius Blows Up Big Time!

programme.title: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! But will he be able to muster the confidence and courage to face the terrible Trebol?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Liar! Usoland on the Run!

programme.title: Usopp runs into trouble in his battle with Treebol, and flashback sheds light on how a young Kyros made the shocking transition from murderer to one of King Riku's most trusted men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fateful Encounter! Kyros and King Riku!

programme.title: In the Royal Palace, Viola, Luffy, and the Toy Soldier have hidden themselves outside Doflamingo's chamber, only to have more enemies approach from behind, leaving them surrounded! Meanwhile, Franky is knocked out cold by the Navy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Operation Failed! Usoland the Hero Dies?!

programme.title: Toys all across Dressrosa regain their human form, a flood of forgotten memories return, and Kyros launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend is Back! Kyros' All-out Blow!

programme.title: Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo's clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!

programme.title: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his newfound followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo's defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dashing onto the Scene! The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army - Sabo!

programme.title: The mystery of Doflamingo's return from the dead is revealed! But there isn't much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!

programme.title: As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The 500 Million Berry Man! Target: Usoland!

programme.title: Doflamingo and Fujitora's agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace, Fujitora stands in his way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through Enemy Lines! Luffy and Zoro Launch the Counter-Attack!

programme.title: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!

programme.title: With Luffy & the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica's giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steady Progress! Luffy‚Äôs Army vs. Pica!

programme.title: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law's handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Shocking Confession! Law's Soulful Vow!

programme.title: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through Doflamingo's guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!

programme.title: Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!

programme.title: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Escape! Luffy's Tide-turning Elephant Gun!

programme.title: The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks towards a unified plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A United Front! Luffy's Breakthrough to the Victory!

programme.title: Hidden far underground, Kin'emon finds his old friend Kanjuro whose powers allow the two to, quickly, but not elegantly, escape to the surface! Meanwhile, Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Second Samurai! Evening Shower Kanjuro Appears!

programme.title: The Tontattas are in full revolt! But can they keep their wits about them long enough to make it out? Meanwhile, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Se√±or Pink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard-Fought Battle Against Pica! Zoro's Deadly Attack!

programme.title: Franky finally makes it into the factory and the Tontattas are reunited with their captive friends! But Princess Mansherry is nowhere to be found. Factory manager Kuween becomes irate when ignored and launches an attack on Franky.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Little People's Princess! Captive Mansherry!

programme.title: Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo draw closer to the Flower Field on the fourth level of the Royal Palace plateau, but a sudden attack by Gladius' exploding spheres sends Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling towards the level below.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invincible! A Gruesome Army of Headcracker Dolls!

programme.title: Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, but unfortunately finds company there that is less than friendly! Meanwhile, Bartolomeo pushes himself to the limit in order to help Luffy advance, but does he leave himself vulnerable in the process?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Risking Their Lives! Luffy is the Trump Card for Victory!

programme.title: Diamante has Rebecca pinned and completely overpowered. If only the Soldier-san of her youth were able to protect her! Meanwhile, Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Reunion! Rebecca and Kyros!

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man‚Äôs body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Looper, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this futuristic action thriller, time travel will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a 'looper,' a hired gun, is waiting to mop up.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Gunslinger, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: When the town marshal is gunned down, his wife Rose (Beverly Garland) dons his badge. But now an evil dancehall diva (Allison Hayes) wants her dead and hires a gunslinger (John Ireland), who agrees to kill Rose...until he falls in love with her!

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land barron and his hired gun.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Boots And Saddles, (1937, Drama)
programme.desc: A British youngster inherits a ranch so burdened with taxes that he struggles to keep the property. Gene Autry befriends the boy, and becomes involved with an Army colonel's daughter and others.

programme.title: The Old Barn Dance, (1938, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Frog Millhouse are horse traders who run into trouble when an unscrupulous tractor company starts selling the modern machines to farmers.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Catch and Release, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Gray Wheeler just lost everything. But it could be the best thing that ever happened to her. After the death of her fianc√©, Gray moves in with her late love's best friends. While Sam and Dennis do their best to cheer Gray up. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Sydney White, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Dramedy)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Jadeite is given a warning by Queen Beryl, who can no longer tolerate the general‚Äôs failures. Jadeite challenges the Sailor Guardians to a showdown.
programme.sub-title: Girls Unite: The End of Jadeite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rui is a talented tennis player but Naru has noticed a dark change in her. Worried about their classmate, Naru and Usagi go to investigate.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami brings Usagi and Rei to her favorite park. Rei decides to have a date with Mamoru at the park before it closes down.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Juban District is having a contest to decide who can design the best wedding dress. Usagi, Rei, and all the girls in town compete.

programme.desc: A photographer named Kijin Shinokawa holds a modeling contest. All the girls who have entered begin disappearing after Shinokawa photographs them!

programme.desc: Shingo‚Äôs friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mika‚Äôs feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that he‚Äôd like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.

programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Erica tries to escape the consequences of her decisions as she falls into a downward spiral; Anna climbs back to the top of her game.

programme.title: Minx
programme.sub-title: Life, Liberty and the Pursuit of Sexiness
programme.desc: Joyce takes her eyes off the ball(s) and ditches work for her new rock star beau.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Coop learns his sperm count is too low for donation; Carrie gets a lucky break; Akalitus poker habit pays off; Grace drops a bomb on Jackie.

programme.title: Nurse Jackie
programme.desc: Kevins engagement sends Jackie off the deep end and leads to a sexy dream; Frank discloses a secret from his past.

programme.title: Weeds
programme.sub-title: If You Work for a Living, Why Do You Kill Yourself Working?
programme.desc: Questioned by the DEA, Nancy makes a shocking confession; Celia travels to make amends with her daughter; Doug finds a reason to live; Silas meets Julies ex-husband.

programme.title: Weeds
programme.desc: Nancy shows Esteban proof of her baby but is unsure of her fate; Celia is held hostage in Mexico; Andy, Silas and Doug discuss growing plans.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: Singer David Bowie reinvents himself as Ziggy Stardust while touring America to promote his new album "The Man Who Sold the World." Starring Johnny Flynn, Jena Malone, Marc Maron.

programme.title: Night Raiders
programme.desc: In a post-war future, a mother joins an underground band of vigilantes to try and rescue her daughter from a state-run institution. Starring Elle-Maija Tailfeathers, Brooklyn Letexier-Hart, Alex Tarrant.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: The team goes on a routine mission to retrieve an Abnormal and take it to safety; the mission becomes anything but routine when they are forced to stage a bank heist in order to protect the public from harm.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Nikola Tesla resurfaces, sending Helen an SOS from deep within the Colombian Highlands; Will doesnt believe he can be trusted, and he may be right.

programme.title: Cooking With Stella
programme.desc: A woman cooks for clients and tries to keep her thefts of food and money from being discovered. Starring Don McKellar, Seema Biswas, Lisa Ray.

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: In a race to find intelligent life in the universe, an astronomer and his freethinking research assistant make an inexplicable discovery that changes how they see the world -- and each other. Starring Patrick J. Adams, Troian Bellisario, Kristen Hager.

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: An inspired Iowa farmer builds a baseball field, then sees "Shoeless" Joe Jacksons ghost and other marvels. Starring Kevin Costner, Amy Madigan, James Earl Jones.

programme.title: Air Bud: World Pup
programme.desc: The golden retriever helps his young owner (Kevin Zegers) and his coed soccer team to shine while outsmarting a wily dogcatcher. Starring Kevin Zegers, Dale Midkiff, Caitlin Wachs.

programme.title: Air Bud: Spikes Back
programme.desc: A dog that plays volleyball helps investigators solve a rash of mysterious crimes. Starring Rob Tinkler, Cynthia Stevenson, Katija Pevec.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: A young woman (Anne Hathaway) embarks on a journey to break the curse of obedience placed upon her by a fairy godmother. Starring Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Friends and former teammates (Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Chris Rock) learn that age does not, necessarily, equal maturity when they reunite to honor the memory of their basketball coach. Starring Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Chris Rock.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny Feder moves his family back to his hometown to be with his old friends and finds out that he didnt leave the crazy life behind in Los Angeles. Starring Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Chris Rock.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.desc: By 2005, law enforcement is closing in on BMF, forcing Terry underground; as the empire collapses, the brothers face life sentences; years later, Terry reflects on their choices, redemption, and the lasting impact of BMF as he begins a new chapter.

programme.title: Friday
programme.desc: A South Central Los Angeles resident hangs out on his front porch with a pal who owes money to a drug dealer. Starring Ice Cube, Chris Tucker, Nia Long.

programme.title: Stage Fright
programme.desc: Blood begins to spill soon after the daughter (Allie MacDonald) of a Broadway diva wins the lead in the summer showcase at a performing-arts camp. Starring Allie MacDonald, Douglas Smith, Minnie Driver.

programme.title: Good Neighbours
programme.desc: Victor is new to Montreal and attempts to make friends with the wheelchair-bound Spencer and the cat-loving Louise, but everybody is on edge with a serial killer terrorizing the neighborhood. Starring Jay Baruchel, Scott Speedman, Emily Hampshire.

programme.title: The Silent Twins
programme.desc: June and Jennifer Gibbons are twins from the only Black family in a small town. After a spree of vandalism, the girls are sentenced to Broadmoor, an infamous psychiatric hospital, where they face the choice to separate and survive or die together. Starring Letitia Wright, Tamara Lawrance, Nadine Marshall.

programme.title: Splice
programme.desc: An experiment goes horribly wrong when two scientists (Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley) use human DNA to create a hybrid creature. Starring Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley, Delphine Chaneac.

programme.title: Racetime
programme.desc: After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race. Starring Lucinda Davis, Noel Fisher, Angela Galuppo.

programme.title: Air Bud
programme.desc: Abandoned by a disagreeable clown (Michael Jeter), a golden retriever with a knack for basketball befriends a lonely boy (Kevin Zegers). Starring Michael Jeter, Kevin Zegers, Wendy Makkena.

programme.title: Tom and Jerrys Giant Adventure
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry encounter a grumpy giant after climbing a beanstalk to a magical land. Starring Garrison Keillor, Paul Reubens, Grey DeLisle.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: An Indiana lineman (Richard Dreyfuss) and other UFO-sighters, beleaguered by earlier incidents, finally have documented contact with space aliens. Starring Richard Dreyfuss, Fran√ßois Truffaut, Teri Garr.

programme.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A boys close encounter with an alien stranded on Earth leads to a unique friendship in Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning film. Starring Henry Thomas, Dee Wallace, Peter Coyote.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy. Starring Dustin Hoffman, Robin Williams, Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A world of adventure is unleashed on siblings Peter and Judy when they find a jungle-themed game called Jumanji in the attic. Starring Robin Williams, Bonnie Hunt, Kirsten Dunst.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four teens embark on the adventure of a lifetime when a video game magically transports them to the jungle and transforms them into adults. Starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Jack Black.

programme.title: Good Fortune
programme.desc: A well-meaning but inept angel named Gabriel meddles in the lives of a struggling gig worker and a wealthy venture capitalist. Starring Seth Rogen, Aziz Ansari, Keke Palmer.

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: A man (Keanu Reeves) who can see demons helps a skeptical policewoman (Rachel Weisz) investigate her twin sisters mysterious death. Starring Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Shia LaBeouf.

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, jazz trumpeter Chet Baker (Ethan Hawke) begins a romance with an actress (Carmen Ejogo) while trying to stage a musical comeback. Starring Ethan Hawke, Carmen Ejogo, Callum Keith Rennie.

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: New York City cop John McClane (Bruce Willis) and his estranged son (Jai Courtney) must put aside their differences and work together to get a Russian whistleblower to safety and thwart a disastrous crime in Chernobyl. Starring Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch.

programme.title: The Boy Friend
programme.desc: An assistant stage manager becomes the star of a musical revue when the leading lady sprains her ankle. Starring Twiggy, Christopher Gable, Max Adrian.

programme.title: My Fair Lady
programme.desc: Oscar-winning adaptation of the Broadway hit about an English professor (Rex Harrison) who teaches a cockney merchant (Audrey Hepburn) to be a lady. Starring Audrey Hepburn, Rex Harrison, Stanley Holloway.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: An English butlers (Anthony Hopkins) devotion to service keeps him from the housekeeper (Emma Thompson) he loves in 1930s England. Starring Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson, James Fox.

programme.title: Anne of the Thousand Days
programme.desc: Henry VIII (Richard Burton) leaves his wife (Irene Papas) and forms the Church of England to marry Anne Boleyn (Genevi√®ve Bujold). Starring Richard Burton, Genevi√®ve Bujold, Irene Papas.

programme.title: Young Bess
programme.desc: Henry VIIIs (Charles Laughton) daughter Elizabeth (Jean Simmons) has a forbidden romance with naval hero Thomas Seymour (Stewart Granger). Starring Jean Simmons, Stewart Granger, Charles Laughton.

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: The arrival of wealthy bachelors in town causes an uproar when families with single daughters aggressively seek engagements, including the Bennet family, with five eligible daughters. Starring Greer Garson, Laurence Olivier, Edna May Oliver.

programme.title: David Copperfield
programme.desc: Dickens Victorian orphan (Freddie Bartholomew) drifts until he finds a friendly aunt and the girl he will marry. Starring W.C. Fields, Freddie Bartholomew, Basil Rathbone.

programme.title: The Secret Land
programme.desc: An authentic re-enactment of Operation High Jump, the U.S. Navys expedition to Antarctica led by Adm. Richard E. Byrd. Starring Robert Montgomery, Robert Taylor, Van Heflin.

programme.title: Festival
programme.desc: Filmmaker Murray Lerner captures influential performances by Bob Dylan, Joan Baez and other artists at the Newport Folk Festival.

programme.title: Freedom on My Mind
programme.desc: Filmmaker Connie Field and Marilyn Mulford profile the Mississippi voter registration project from 1961-64.

programme.title: The Times of Harvey Milk
programme.desc: Harvey Fierstein narrates this Oscar-winning account of the life and death of openly gay politician Harvey Milk.

programme.title: Elvis: Thats the Way It Is
programme.desc: Clips show Elvis Presley backstage, in rehearsal, and on the road before his 1970 Las Vegas opening night.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: Safecracker Henri "The Butterfly" Charriere (Steve McQueen) tries to escape from Devils Island with counterfeiter Louis Dega (Dustin Hoffman). Starring Steve McQueen, Dustin Hoffman, Victor Jory.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A warden (Eddie Albert) forces an ex-football star (Burt Reynolds) to lead fellow inmates in a game against the guards. Starring Burt Reynolds, Eddie Albert, Ed Lauter.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Caught smuggling hashish, American Billy Hayes (Brad Davis) is made an example of and given a harsh sentence in a hellish Turkish prison. Starring Brad Davis, Randy Quaid, John Hurt.

programme.title: The Big House
programme.desc: Prison brings out the worst in a forger (Chester Morris), a killer (Wallace Beery) and a drunken driver (Robert Montgomery) in for manslaughter. Starring Wallace Beery, Chester Morris, Robert Montgomery.

programme.title: Weary River
programme.desc: A convict (Richard Barthelmess) gains radio fame and the governors attention with his newly discovered singing talent. Starring Richard Barthelmess, Betty Compson, William Holden.

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
programme.desc: March won an Oscar for his portrayal of the scientist whose experiments bring out a hideous side of his personality. Starring Fredric March, Miriam Hopkins, Rose Hobart.

programme.title: Dr. Cyclops
programme.desc: A mad doctor (Albert Dekker) in Peru reduces a woman (Janice Logan) and three men to one-fifth their normal size. Starring Albert Dekker, Janice Logan, Thomas Coley.

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: H.G. Wells time traveler journeys through time, experiencing several civilizations. Oscar-winning special effects. Starring Rod Taylor, Alan Young, Yvette Mimieux.

programme.title: Dr. Ehrlichs Magic Bullet
programme.desc: The story of the renowned bacteriologist whose years of research yielded such medical triumphs as a cure for syphilis. Starring Edward G. Robinson, Ruth Gordon, Otto Kruger.

programme.title: The Story of Louis Pasteur
programme.desc: French scientist Louis Pasteur discovers cures for rabies and anthrax, and develops a process for sterilizing raw milk. Starring Paul Muni, Josephine Hutchinson, Anita Louise.

programme.title: Madame Curie
programme.desc: After a laboratory courtship, the Polish scientist (Greer Garson) and her French husband (Walter Pidgeon) discover radium in 1898. Starring Greer Garson, Walter Pidgeon, Henry Travers.

programme.title: Edison, the Man
programme.desc: Inventor Thomas Alva Edison (Spencer Tracy) finds a bride (Rita Johnson), has a family and wires Manhattan with his incandescent lights. Starring Spencer Tracy, Rita Johnson, Lynne Overman.

programme.title: Driving Miss Daisy
programme.desc: An Atlanta widow (Jessica Tandy) and her chauffeur (Morgan Freeman) reflect the changing times, from 1948 to 1973. Starring Morgan Freeman, Jessica Tandy, Dan Aykroyd.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: A wheeler-dealer (Tom Cruise) meets his brother (Dustin Hoffman), an institutionalized autistic-savant, heir to $3 million. Starring Dustin Hoffman, Tom Cruise, Valeria Golino.

programme.title: Bullitt
programme.desc: Steve McQueen stars as a San Francisco officer who must unravel the mafia ties behind the shooting of a key witness he was hired to protect in this crime drama. Starring Steve McQueen, Robert Vaughn, Jacqueline Bisset.

programme.title: Grand Prix
programme.desc: Personal lives of Formula One drivers (James Garner, Yves Montand) affect their performance on the European circuit. Starring James Garner, Eva Marie Saint, Yves Montand.

programme.title: Wild Strawberries
programme.desc: An old Swedish professor (Victor Sjostrom) sees his life pass by in a series of nightmarish flashbacks. Starring Victor Sjostrom, Ingrid Thulin, Bibi Andersson.

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: An enslaved Judean prince (Charlton Heston) meets his Roman betrayer (Stephen Boyd), a former friend, in a chariot race. Starring Charlton Heston, Jack Hawkins, Stephen Boyd.

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: Controversial British officer T.E. Lawrence (Peter OToole) learns the culture of Arabs (Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn) and unites their tribes against the Turks. Starring Peter OToole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn.

programme.title: Cleopatra
programme.desc: The queen of Egypt (Elizabeth Taylor) seduces Julius Caesar (Rex Harrison), but when he is killed, she uses Mark Antony (Richard Burton) as her new protector. Starring Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, Rex Harrison.

programme.title: Gone With the Wind
programme.desc: Presented as originally released in 1939. Includes themes and character depictions which may be offensive and problematic to contemporary audiences. A Southern belle struggles to return her familys estate to its original glory after the Civil War. Starring Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Leslie Howard.

programme.desc: The Russian Revolution forms the backdrop for this tale of a sensitive Russian physician (Omar Sharif) who is torn between his loyal, long-suffering wife (Geraldine Chaplin) and the great love (Julie Christie) of his life. Starring Omar Sharif, Julie Christie, Geraldine Chaplin.

programme.desc: Sailing around the world alone, for 300 days, pushes sailors to their physical and emotional limits in the Golden Globe Race.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Sarika Cullis-Suzuki explores how natures slowest creatures survive and thrive. A celebration of resilience, adaptation and the quiet brilliance of taking life slowly. Host: Sarika Cullis-Suzuki.

programme.title: The Good Canadian
programme.desc: Myth, truth and national identity. This documentary takes you behind the curtain and into the corridors of power to reveal the true face of a nation.

programme.title: Murder at My Door with Kym Marsh
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive millionaire, bludgeoned to death while he slept after hiring three people to renovate one of his properties.

programme.title: The Devils Handshake
programme.desc: A POV feature, examining Nazism through a very different lens; apersonal and unexpected degrees of separation of a filmmaker to Adolf Hitler woven into an unsettling story of otherwise good people caught up on the wrong side. Starring Andrew Wall.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: A devoted mother vanishes without a trace; decades later, a backyard excavation unearths the truth, exposing a long-buried crime and a betrayal that shattered a family.

programme.title: McVeigh
programme.desc: After the deadly siege in Waco, Texas, U.S. Army veteran Timothy McVeigh hatches a sinister plan to blow up the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building in Oklahoma City. Starring Alfie Allen, Brett Gelman, Ashley Benson.

programme.title: Return to Wickensburg
programme.desc: Mr. Hexenmeister has escaped from prison, and once again threatens Wickensburg. A race against time to find an ancient orb, capable of destroying the entire town, before it falls into the wrong hands. Starring Denise Richards, Julian Richings, Steve Byers.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved Heists
programme.desc: When Quebecs maple syrup reserve is plundered, detectives must track down the culprits before the situation boils over; detectives uncover a conspiracy that threatens to shake the very foundations of the maple syrup industry.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: A confession to a lesser crime is still a false confession; when Nick Nehring admits to gunning down a man, claims of self-defense set him up for a shorter sentence; getting the true story could mean the difference of year.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.sub-title: Henry Martin Steiger and Julian Mesure
programme.desc: Young mother Cassandra Robinson hasnt been seen in weeks and her family and friends are getting worried. With a one-year-old baby at home, it is uncharacteristic of her to leave for so long.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: A thief buries a husband and wife after robbing them; evidence points to a group that includes Bruce and Michael as being involved; the methods of interrogation utilized to get different suspects to talk can be a stark contrast.

programme.title: Bif Naked
programme.desc: With unprecedented access and Bifs own unapologetic voice, this is a ride from gritty punk clubs to platinum albums, through cancer wards, courtrooms, and backstage chaos, proving that survival is the most punk rock thing of all. Starring George Stroumboulopoulos, Jann Arden, Bif Naked.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - My Two Big Daddies
programme.desc: Posing as a single father, Steve (Steve Harvey) uses young Romeo (Merlin Santana) to rope in an attractive single mother (guest star Alex Datcher).

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Boomerang
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) becomes a fool for love when he falls for Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) friend (guest star Roxanne Beckford). With William Lee Scott.

programme.title: The Harlem Globetrotters: Secrets of the City - Stuttgart; Sydney

programme.desc: A do-it-yourself sibling trio serving Spanish cuisine.

programme.title: City Eats: Atlanta - Little Bear
programme.desc: Finding out why this restaurant calls itself Michelin Tire style dining, bringing Szechuan and Jewish cuisines to an innovative plate of incredible flavor.

programme.title: City Eats: Atlanta - Pit Boss BBQ
programme.desc: Host Zak Wallace takes a trip down memory lane and gets a taste of Hapevilles finest.

programme.title: City Eats: Atlanta - This Is It!
programme.desc: Celebrating the 40th anniversary of the largest Black-owned chain of Southern comfort food in the Southeast with host Zak Wallace.

programme.title: If You Really Love Me
programme.desc: The deceased mother of three women returns to Earth as an angel to help them rediscover what is truly important in life.

programme.title: The Forgettable Life of Liam White
programme.desc: An uninspired novelist begins a journey of self-reflection and reconciliation when he learns that his cancer has returned.

programme.title: Family Time - No Lie Zone
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa ban all lying in the household, including the little white lies that hold the family together.

programme.title: Family Time - Lisas Leftovers
programme.desc: Lisa gets upset when her sister Lori begins dating her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Family Time - Powering Down
programme.desc: Tony feels his family is drifting apart so he bans technology in the household.

programme.title: Family Time - The Oops Baby
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa must deal with the possibility of a new baby.

programme.title: Family Time - Cut It Out
programme.desc: Tony spends time in the local barbershop with friends; Lori considers her options for having a baby.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Easy Rider
programme.desc: A motorcycle accident changes Bernies perspective about protecting the kids; Jordan is caught trying to sell Bernies girlie magazines to other boys at school.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Whos That Lady?
programme.desc: Dr. Phil McGraw counsels Bernie on how to deal with Wanda, who feels left out after Bernie and the guys draft a woman (MoNique) into their group.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Mac-Inations
programme.desc: Neighbor Carl Reiner (guest starring as himself) plays the ultimate practical joke on Bernie. Ashton Kutcher guest stars as himself.

programme.desc: American Idol judges Paula Abdul and Randy Jackson critique Bernies commercial.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Talk
programme.desc: Bernie stops by the Playboy Mansion to get advice from Hugh Hefner on how to talk to Jordan about sex.

programme.desc: Regina rooms with Steve when a roof fire leaves her homeless; romance heats up between Romeo and Sara.

programme.desc: Steve refuses to allow Snoop Doggy Dogg and Sean Puffy Combs to use music from the Hi-Tops until they resolve their rivalry.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Cant Buy Me Love
programme.desc: A new student (Kenan Thompson) gives Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) an extravagant birthday gift, but Steve (Steve Harvey) pretends it is from him.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Whatever You Want
programme.desc: Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) new assistant (Terri J. Vaughn) falls in love with Cedric (Cedric the Entertainer); Romeo (Merlin Santana) befriends his formerly overweight neighbor (Ariyan Johnson).

programme.desc: Biff Smith and Hanashi Weathers face off in the first round of the finals; they will be grilling up succulent duck with a side of carrots; each of the pitmasters must incorporate The Scott Group BBQ sauce of their choice into their dishes.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
programme.desc: After shooting the man who murdered his wife, a Danish settler (Mads Mikkelsen) incurs the wrath of the mans brother (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a ruthless land baron who rules their frontier town.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: The Godfather (1972)
programme.desc: Crime boss Vito Corleone and his sons, the ruthless yet loyal members of the Corleone family, rule their secretive New York empire with an iron fist.

programme.title: The Score (2001)
programme.desc: A master thief (Robert De Niro) agrees to work with a volatile partner (Edward Norton) for one last heist before he retires.

programme.title: The Yards (2000)
programme.desc: A friends lure of easy money draws an ex-con into the corrupt world of his uncles subway-train business.

programme.title: Backcountry (2014)
programme.desc: A couple (Missy Peregrym, Jeff Roop) on a deep-wilderness hike become hopelessly lost within an aggressive black bears territory.

programme.title: The Killer Inside Me (2010)
programme.desc: An encounter with an aggressive prostitute (Jessica Alba) brings a Texas lawmans (Casey Affleck) homicidal tendencies screaming to the surface.

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption (2010)
programme.desc: Uri Boyka is an inmate trapped in the toughest prison in the world. He is ready to make his comeback in a lethal boxing competition for a shot at freedom.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: Captive (2015)
programme.desc: Recovering drug addict Ashley Smith (Kate Mara) reads Rick Warrens "The Purpose Driven Life" as armed fugitive Brian Nichols (David Oyelowo) holds her hostage in her apartment.

programme.title: Barrons Cove (2024)
programme.desc: A man with a violent past kidnaps the boy he holds responsible for his sons death. As he grows closer to uncovering the truth, hes left to wonder whether his pursuers are really seeking to protect the boy, or merely the secrets he keeps.

programme.title: Equilibrium (2002)
programme.desc: In the future a government agent (Christian Bale) and a band of rebels battle a regime that uses a drug to suppress peoples emotions.

programme.title: Dont Knock Twice (2016)
programme.desc: A mother looking to reconnect with her estranged daughter attracts the attention of a demonic witch.

programme.title: Twisted (2004)
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: Jennys Wedding (2015)
programme.desc: When Jenny (Katherine Heigl) decides to marry a woman (Alexis Bledel), her conventional family must accept who she is or risk losing her forever.

programme.title: Boys and Girls (2000)
programme.desc: Two longtime friends (Freddie Prinze Jr., Claire Forlani), each with a string of failed romances, wonder if they should date each other.

programme.title: Down to You (2000)
programme.desc: Two collegians (Freddie Prinze Jr., Julia Stiles) fall in love but have a bumpy affair due to mischievous roommates and the temptation to stray.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
programme.desc: Benjamin Button (Brad Pitt) is born an old man in 1918 New Orleans and ages in reverse and, in so doing, becomes intimately familiar with the natures of love and death.

programme.title: Forces of Nature (1999)
programme.desc: A bridegroom (Ben Affleck) hurries by plane to his wedding, but he and his seatmate (Sandra Bullock) must find other modes of travel.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here (2020)
programme.desc: A successful author finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students after being asked to speak at her alma mater.

programme.title: Pretty Red Dress (2022)
programme.desc: The story of Travis, Candice and their daughter, Kenisha, and their relationships with the same red dress.

programme.title: Marvins Room (1996)
programme.desc: A Florida leukemia patient (Diane Keaton) needs her sisters (Meryl Streep) bone marrow, but first they must end a 20-year feud.

programme.title: The Hours (2002)
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Queen Bees (2021)
programme.desc: While her house undergoes repairs, fiercely independent senior Helen temporarily moves into a nearby retirement community, where she encounters lusty widows, cutthroat bridge tournaments and a hotbed of bullying "mean girls."

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh welder works days, dances in a bar at night, dates her boss and chases the dream of acceptance into a prestigious ballet school.

programme.title: Mothers Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mothers Day draws near, a single mom (Jennifer Aniston) learns that her ex-husband (Timothy Olyphant) is marrying a younger woman (Shay Mitchell), while a recently widowed man (Jason Sudeikis) struggles to raise his two daughters.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Shes the Man (2006)
programme.desc: Romantic complications ensue when a student poses as her twin brother and replaces him at his boarding school.

programme.title: Grease 2 (1982)
programme.desc: A square British exchange student (Maxwell Caulfield) turns hip motorcyclist to woo a cool girl (Michelle Pfeiffer) in his 1961 high school.

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh welder works days, dances in a bar at night, dates her boss and chases the dream of acceptance into a prestigious ballet school.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love (1998)
programme.desc: Young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes) falls for Viola (Gwyneth Paltrow), reawakening his creativity, but she is betrothed to Wessex.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Mothers Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mothers Day draws near, a single mom (Jennifer Aniston) learns that her ex-husband (Timothy Olyphant) is marrying a younger woman (Shay Mitchell), while a recently widowed man (Jason Sudeikis) struggles to raise his two daughters.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard at Guant√°namo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: Regarding Us (2025)
programme.desc: After losing her teaching career, A transgender woman has a profound impact on the lives of two children.

programme.title: The Argument (2020)
programme.desc: When a couple argue about a party and neither will back down, they decide to re-create the evening to determine who is right.

programme.title: Kate and Leopold (2001)
programme.desc: A Manhattan woman (Meg Ryan) falls in love with the 19th-century Duke of Albany (Hugh Jackman) who has stepped through a time portal.

programme.title: The Prince and Me (2004)
programme.desc: Paige, a premedical student, falls in love with Eddie, a Danish prince, who keeps his identity a secret.

programme.title: Runaway Bride (1999)
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Richard Gere) travels to Maryland to profile a woman (Julia Roberts) who left three bridegrooms at the altar.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby (2016)
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall (2024)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven (2005)
programme.desc: A San Francisco widower (Mark Ruffalo) falls in love with a ghostly doctor (Reese Witherspoon) while subletting her apartment.

programme.title: Election (1999)
programme.desc: Tracy faces no competition in her high school election, but the civics teacher intervenes by encouraging the varsity football player to run for president, resulting in chaos.

programme.title: Superstar (1999)
programme.desc: An energetic schoolgirl (Molly Shannon) hopes to win a talent contest where a prize as a movie extra might lead to her first kiss.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part (2017)
programme.desc: Madison Roland finds love with another man after she leaves her abusive husband, Michael, and changes her identity. All seems well, until Michael discovers Madisons whereabouts and re-creates her nightmare all over again.

programme.title: Ask the Dust (2006)
programme.desc: In Depression-era Los Angeles, a fiery Mexican waitress (Salma Hayek) who wants to improve her lot through marriage meets an aspiring writer (Colin Farrell) of Italian descent.

programme.title: The Beldham (2024)
programme.desc: A struggling new mother fights a generations-old presence lurking within her familys home, threatening her safety, her sanity, and the life of her infant child.

programme.title: The First Wives Club (1996)
programme.desc: Three 50-ish college friends (Goldie Hawn, Bette Midler, Diane Keaton) plot revenge after their husbands dump them for younger women.

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton! (2004)
programme.sub-title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton! (2004)
programme.desc: Secretly in love with his friend (Kate Bosworth), a supermarket manager (Topher Grace) becomes jealous when she meets a famous actor (Josh Duhamel).

programme.title: End of Sentence (2019)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a young man reluctantly embarks on a journey with his estranged father to spread his mothers ashes in her native Ireland.
